name: Izcalli Of The Wind
description:
Izcalli of the Wind is a game of momentum, elegant motion, and channelling flow. Swiftly navigate the environment by riding a god imbued relic in hoverboard fashion and build energy while completing trials to transfer into seals, repowering the island's main conduit and opening a path to the god's main temple!

The game was developed by a team of 16 students over 8 months at the Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy (FIEA). The goal was to develop a fun fast-paced game with tight controls and an unique environment.  

**Controller Highly Recommended**

  • Rhythmic Navigation: gracefully glide around the environment and use abilities to find lines flow and get into the zone!
  • Build and Disperse Energy: build energy by maintaining high speeds and drifting, using that energy to activate abilities and repower seals.
  • Slipstreams of Energy: as you repower the world, ride the slipstreams of energy to reach new areas and challenges! You can also absorb and release energy into the slipstreams to alter their speed!
  • Tempest Staff: turrets and drones are on high alert to disrupt and thwart your progress. Use the tempest staff to deal with them swiftly!
